Takeo and its hot springs have existed for over a thousand years. Recently the city has undergone extensive renovation and expansion with new projects.

, 5 minutes from Takeo Station. The gyoza and ramen here are cheap "B-class gourmet," but they're well-known in the area and the atmosphere is always lively.
